name: V_EHI_PBA_PB_ACCT
description: This view filters out account data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the premium billing account.

columns.name: BILL_ADDR1
columns.description: Street address line 1 for premium billing account billing address.

columns.name: BILL_ADDR2
columns.description: Street address line 2 for premium billing account billing address.

columns.name: BILL_CITY
columns.description: City for premium billing account billing address.

columns.name: BILL_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: State for premium billing account billing address.

columns.name: BILL_ZIP
columns.description: ZIP Code for premium billing account billing address.

columns.name: BILL_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: County for premium billing account billing address.

columns.name: BILL_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: Country for premium billing account billing address.

columns.name: BILL_PHONE
columns.description: Billing phone number for premium billing account.

columns.name: BILL_FAX
columns.description: Billing fax number for premium billing account.

columns.name: BILL_EMAIL
columns.description: Billing e-mail address for premium billing account.

columns.name: INVMSG_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of note to be included on premium billing invoices for the premium billing account.

columns.name: BAL_DUE
columns.description: Balance due for the premium billing account.

columns.name: HIX_ACCT_BAL_DUE
columns.description: This item contains the subscriber's portion of the balance due on the associated group premium billing account.

columns.name: TOTAL_BAL_DUE
columns.description: This item contains the total of the account balance plus the subscriber's portion of the balance due on the associated group premium billing account.

columns.name: AR_ACCT_BALANCE
columns.description: The account balance stores the sum of all transaction amounts for transactions that have filed to the account.

columns.name: BILL_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: House number for premium billing account billing address.

columns.name: BILL_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: District for the premium billing account billing address.
